class stheno.measure.GP(*args, **kw_args)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.random.RandomProcess

Gaussian process.

Parameters

  • kernel (kernel.Kernel) – Kernel of the process.

  • mean (mean.Mean, optional) – Mean function of the process. Defaults to zero.

  • measure (measure.Measure) – Measure to attach to. Must be given as a keyword argument.

  • name (str, optional) – Name. Must be given as a keyword argment.

measure¶

Measure that was given to the GP at construction.

Type

measure.Measure

diff(dim=0)[source]¶

Differentiate the GP. See measure.Graph.diff().

diff_approx(deriv=1, order=6)[source]¶

Approximate the derivative of the GP by constructing a finite difference approximation.

Parameters

  • deriv (int, optional) – Order of the derivative. Defaults to 1.

  • order (int, optional) – Order of the estimate. Defaults to 6.

Returns

Approximation of the derivative of the GP.

Return type

measure.GP
